archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Special Pricing Condition
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Maintain a price list or single conditions (with ranges and optional terms) by various dimensions, e.g. customer segment (e.g. employee conditions), for exceptional product independent pricing conditions that override standard pricing derived from the pricing product.
Control record: Directory entry reference details, Entry properties/values, Entry status, Directory record access activity/feedback details ---
Special Pricing Conditions Description: Maintain a price list or single conditions (with ranges and optional terms) by various dimensions, e.g. customer segment (e.g. employee conditions), for exceptional product independent pricing conditions that override standard pricing derived from the pricing product.
Control record: Directory entry reference details, Entry properties/values, Entry status, Directory record access activity/feedback details
